title: Sonic Will (Probably) Never Kiss a Woman Again - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.16.22
description:
The Besties and Polygon's Russ Frushtick joins Greg to talk Sonic kissing humans, Halo Infinite's embarrassment, and more! 

﻿Follow Russ: https://twitter.com/RussFrushtick

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:03 - Housekeeping
We’re rewatching all the Thor movies for Love and Thunder, so right now you can catch the kickoff with Thor’s MCU In Review Re-Review!
00:08:35 -  Please rank the likelihood of each game being announced: - Best Friends Q:Jake Bakes Cakes
Final Fantasy VII 25th Anniversary Celebration Broadcast at 3 pm PT - live on twitch, later on youtube
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire & Fargo Brady
The Roper Report   -
00:12:34 - Sonic Will (Probably) Never Kiss a Woman Again, Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:22:50 - Halo Infinite Publishes, Fixes Offensive Juneteenth Cosmetic Name, Brendan Lowry @ Windows Central
00:31:32 - PlayStation Elite Controller Incoming?! Tom Henderson @ Try Hard Guides
00:37:20 -  Ad
00:39:40 -  Keep Your Eyes on the Switch
00:47:22 - Xbox App on PC Adds Performance Indicator, Xbox
00:50:10 -  Cory Barlog tweet
00:52:48 - Out today
00:59:05 - No  loot boxes in overwatch two
01:03:01 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Bless
